101020.name: Agile Phoenix
101020.tooltip: Increases movement speed by {value1} for {value2} seconds upon resurrection. Ends upon entering combat.

101010.name: Might Phoenix
101010.tooltip: Upon resurrection, received damage is reduced by 50% for {value1} seconds.

102010.name: Empowered Speed
102010.tooltip: Increases mount movement speed by 20 for {value1}. Effect has a 5 minute cooldown.

112010.name: Lethal Lesson
112010.tooltip: Has {value3}% chance to increase Crit Resist by {value2} for 5 seconds upon receiving a critical hit. Subsequent critical hits while the buff is still active will grant {value4} additional Crit Resist, up to a total maximum of {value1} for 5 seconds.

820210.name: Vengeful Pummel
820210.tooltip:: Has {value1}% chance to increase crit factor by {value2} on successful block.

820230.name: Speed Skating: Retribution
820230.tooltip: Has a {value1}% chance to increase Shield Counter casting speed by {value2}% on a successful block.

820310.name: Impact
820310.tooltip: Has {value1}% chance to knock down monsters or {value2}% chance to stun players.

820420.name: Protection
820420.tooltip: Has {value1}% chance of creating a barrier that absorbs {value3} damage for {value2} seconds.

820710.name: Turning Tables
820710.tooltip:: Skill cooldown decreases by {value1} seconds for every attack the player suffers while being knocked-down.

820810.name: Fatal Blow
820810.tooltip: Has {value1}% chance of increasing Critical Power by {value2} when critting on an enemy.

821110.name: Turning Tables
821110.tooltip: Has {value1}% chance to reset skill cooldown when knocked down.

821310.name: Trample
821310.tooltip: Increases EP Attack Power by {value1} when attacking a knocked-down target.

821610.name: Purification
821610.tooltip: Has a {value1}% chance to cleanse debuffs.

821720.name: Force
821720.tooltip: Increases power by {value2} for 10 seconds. Has {value3}% chance to increase power by 1 on each hit. Effect can stack up to {value1} power.

940610.name: Counter
940610.tooltip: Crit Power increases by {value1} when critically hitting target successfully.

940710.name: Critical Pummel
940710.tooltip: Increases Crit Factor by {value1} for 30 seconds when successfully hitting target 3 times.

940720.name: Counter
940720.tooltip: Crit Power increases by {value1} when critically hitting target successfully.

940910.name: Counter
940910.tooltip: Crit Power increases by {value1} when critically hitting target successfully.

941010.name: Counter
941010.tooltip: Crit Power increases by {value1} when critically hitting target successfully.

941310.tooltip: Crit Power increases by {value1} when critically hitting target successfully.
